tool_description: An API that returns the sentiment and subjectivity of a given text in JSON
name: Text Sentiment API
title: Text Sentiment API

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a string as a parameter and returns the sentiment scores (polarity and subjectivity) of the text as well as the 'Full Text', 'Language', 'Entities', 'Keywords', 'Sentiment Label' and 'Subjectivity Label'.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.default: Renewable energy in Australia is a growing industry which is good
